basics.name: Elijah Saloma
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

work.summary: Learning assistant to approximately 40-50 Calculus 2 students
highlights: Assist Calculus 2 students during a recitation with classwork and homework
Host office hours regularly, along with appointment

awards.title: 2023 Hawaii Star Ball Amateur Rhythm Pre-Novice, 1st Place
awards.summary: Participated in Hawaii Star Ball, a ballroom dance competition, placing 1st for Cha-Cha and 1st for Rumba, overall placing 1st.

awards.title: 2023 Hawaii Star Ball Amateur Smooth Pre-Novice, 2nd Place
awards.summary: Participated in Hawaii Star Ball, a ballroom dance competition, placing 1st for Waltz and 2nd for Tango, overall placing 2nd.
